game_description: The Imagination Library is a library that exists in a virtual space. It is a space that represents the "accumulation of knowledge," like a combination of a modern library and a museum. When the physical constraints disappear. When physical constraints disappear, do we no longer need the real thing? Will information become "knowledge" as it is? In order to obtain "knowledge" from the vast amount of information In order to obtain knowledge from a vast amount of information, isn't it rather necessary to have entities in virtual space? With this in mind, we have been exhibiting our work in various ways. This application is a VR exhibition of the Imagination Library.
Developer: 超現実研究会（Over Realism Club）
Publisher: 超現実研究会（Over Realism Club）
